Fun game to play at times, gets really annoying in matchmaking when you're going against hackers that toggle on from the start or when they think you cheat. Get's a kill on you with their cheats, says "1" and then calls you a "nonamer". Honestly wish they were all banned at this point, they find all types of way to ruin the game like ddosing you, crashing the server or just have "fake head" where you can't even hit them. Cheaters just ruin the fun of the game in general. Trust factor system is ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥t when you get reported by ♥♥♥♥♥♥ low ranks, which it places you into bad trust factor and go against cheaters.
obvsly best fps by far, but only faceit tho
